alert.note: Alert for Lake; Newton (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 12:56AM EDT until July 29 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NEWTON AND LAKE COUNTIES... At 1155 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Ogden Dunes to near Crown Point to Morocco, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Gary, Portage, Merrillville, Schererville, Hobart, Crown Point, Highland, Cedar Lake, Lowell, Morocco, Lake Village, Griffith, St. John, Lake Station, Lakes of the Four Seasons, Winfield, Roselawn, New Chicago, Lake Dalecarlia and Brook. This includes... Indiana University Northwest, Illiana Motor Speedway, Lake County Fairgrounds, and US 41 Dragway. Including the following interstates... Indiana I-80 between mile markers 8 and 16. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 16 and 21. Indiana I-94 near mile marker 16. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 233 and 261. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
